metadata.description: In this cinematic prelude to Amazing Spider-Man 2, we catch up with Peter Parker as he juggles his life as a super hero, his relationship with Gwen Stacy, and his new responsibilities as a freelance photographer.  When he encounters a robbery-in-progress at a warehouse containing a mysterious piece of tech, Spider-Man swings into action like never before in a full-blown Infinite Comic extravaganza.  Don't miss this all-new lead-in to the upcoming "The Amazing Spider-Man  2"!
metadata.name: Amazing Spider-Man Cinematic Infinite Digital Comic
